scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n api,admin,landing -c green,blue,magenta "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:landing"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend/crud-pucara && npm install --prefix frontend/admin-frontend && npm install --prefix frontend/landing
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:admin && npm run build:landing
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:admin
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format:landing
scripts.check:all: npm run lint:all && npm run typecheck
